name: Sewer Surfer (fallinfrog)
description:
(The design of this page is still a work in progress)

What is this game?

This was  originally a tutorial I followed on Youtube, check it out right here, to make a Google Chrome Dinosaur game in the Godot Engine.

The 9-Part tutorial series was finished in a day, and it took another day to add the TMNT sprites and setup the background. I already had the sprites from another project, but thought this would be a fun little side project.

Controls: 

If you are playing on a computer, you can use SPACEBAR or the UP arrow to make your randomly selected turtle jump.

If you are on mobile, you can just tap the screen.

  • Try to see how long you can survive to raise your score.
  • Avoid enemies and obstacles.
  • Grab pizzas to increase your score.
  • Have fun!

Copy the link, share with your friends!
